title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.292 - Replacement cost
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.292 - Replacement cost

State Regulations
(a) The cost of an
acquired asset or asset part, capitalizable if the cost of its retired
counterpart is removed from the asset account. (b) The cost at current prices, in a
particular locality or market area, of replacing an item or property or a group
of assets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.292

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
